originalText.text: 10/10!! Dan and Ciel did an amazing job taking my paintings and turning them into scanned digital versions that included every brush stroke and the texture of the paper too. I can't recommend them more and will absolutely be working with them in the future for any other high-quality scanning needs.

text.text: 10/10!! Dan and Ciel did an amazing job taking my paintings and turning them into scanned digital versions that included every brush stroke and the texture of the paper too. I can't recommend them more and will absolutely be working with them in the future for any other high-quality scanning needs.

originalText.text: Ciel Mahoney at SugarHill Works has been making archival pigment prints of my photographs for five years and she does a wonderful job.  Her prints are flawless and she will work collaboratively if you wish.  She's got a great eye, is attentive to detail, and will advise if she sees a problem with the image to be printed, yet she is very respectful of my vision and, if needed, will work with me to bring it forth.  She's terrific.

text.text: Ciel Mahoney at SugarHill Works has been making archival pigment prints of my photographs for five years and she does a wonderful job.  Her prints are flawless and she will work collaboratively if you wish. She's terrific.

originalText.text:
Hurricane Irene hit the Catskills with a vengeance back in 2011. My biggest worry was losing my grandmothers 50+ year old oil paintings. I decided that I would like to scan them, hang copies in upstate house, and keep originals in city house.

I do not remember how exactly but I found SugarHillScan, about 7 blocks from my home and have had an amazing ongoing experience. All of my grandmother's paintings are scanned and beautifully printed,. I have passed many photo projects on as well and have always been pleased with the results.

Ciel & Dan are professional and accomadating. They even went so far as scanning and printing a rush job for my parent's 2014 60th wedding anniversary party that required them to work with very old and very small photographs. The framed photos were a lovely addition to the party.

I am so glad that SugarHillScan survived Covid-19 because i have a wealth of pending projects. I am only limited by my budget and my imagination!

originalText.text:
I’ve done several projects with Sugarhill - Dan’s scans of my drawings look consistently great and I trust him completely! Just received my first giclee print done by Ciel and couldn’t be happier - it was hard to tell it wasn’t original!! Easy to communicate and agree on appointment times for drop off/pick up.
Thank you guys!!

originalText.text:
I have been working with Ciel and Dan for over three years now. They do really beautiful work on my prints and are very good at spotting any "artifacts" I may have left behind when I prepared the image.
They are also personable and friendly.
Check them out. You won't be sorry.
